attributes.action: Allow Disabled to claim Winter fuel allowance "It's not just for the old" how unfair!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are the disabled excluded from Winter Fuel Allowance? 

I'm disabled with very restricted mobility and i certainly need extra heating in the winter but too scared to use it  and what with all the increases i dread the winter coming.

So please lets get some fairness in this country!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
